violations: Missing PPE: At least one worker missing a hard hat.
Workers standing in cluttered area with debris and materials.
Improper equipment usage: Materials not secured properly, risk of falling.
locations: Center of the image where workers are gathered.
Near the pile of wooden planks and debris in the center.
recommendations: Ensure all workers wear hard hats at all times.
Clear the cluttered area to allow safe passage and work environment.
Secure materials properly to prevent shifting and falling hazards.
worker_positions: Clustered in the center of the image, near debris.
Standing around wooden planks and materials.
